div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1658 Mit Rahineh, near Memphis, 20 km. (723) S of Cairo, 1912-1920 Burial: c. 330 B.C. (Jenkins) Contents: 38 AV Nakhthorehbe: st. (hieroglyphic) Disposition: J. Khaouam, Cairo; Jameson 2618 Chassinat, RecTravEgyptAssyr 1923, pp. 131-57, illus. Hill, NC 1926, pp. 132-3
